text: Robinson Cano (born October 22, 1982) is a Dominican second baseman for the Seattle Mariners. He started playing for the New York Yankees in 2005. He has been named an All-Star three times. For the last few years, he has been one of the best-hitting second baseman in the league. He won the 2011 Home Run Derby. Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:New York Yankees players Category:Seattle Mariners players
title: Robinson Cano
